name: Coleman Playground Skatepark
description: Uptown skatepark in Washington Heights with a tight but fun layout. Strong local scene.
history: Grassroots effort by uptown skaters brought this park to life. Represents the growing skate culture north of 125th.
bestTimes: After school hours for the local crew. Weekday mornings for solo sessions.
transitDirections: A train to 175th St, walk east.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include mini ramp, quarter pipe, ledges, manual pad. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Washington Heights. Grassroots effort by uptown skaters brought this park to life. Represents the growing skate culture north of 125th.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: A train to 175th St, walk east.. After school hours for the local crew. Weekday mornings for solo sessions.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
